NK039(ti)024:1: // dpal ldan lha mo'i drag po thun gyi yig chung thog ma'i dmigs pa'o //
NK039(ti)024:2: dpal phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK039(ti)024:3: 'dir dpal ldan lha mos drag po'i phrin las kyi dgra bgegs tshar gcod pa'i las tshogs las /
NK039(ti)024:4: gong du phyag na rdo rje bdag bskyed bsnyen pa dang bcas pa dang /
NK039(ti)024:5: mdun du lha mo'i bsnyen bsgrub las gsum gyis phrin
NK039(ti)024:6: las byed tshul rnams rgyas par gzhung gzhan du bshad
NK039(ti)024:7: pa'i phyag len ltar byas la /
NK039(ti)024:8: 'dir skabs su bab pa'i mdun gru gsum dang gzugs
NK039(ti)024:9: brnyan thun rdzas gtor ma dang bcas 'tshogs par byas
NK039(ti)024:10: / rang nyid lha'i nga rgyal brtan pa'i ngang nas chas dang ldan par byas te /
NK039(ti)024:12: ka ho dgongs su gsol lo //
NK039(ti)024:13: na mo skyabs dam pa rnams kyi mchog /
NK039(ti)024:14: mgon dam pa rnams kyis gling /
NK039(ti)024:15: bsod nams bsags pa rnams kyis dpal zhing /
NK039(ti)024:16: bde legs thams cad kyi rtsa ba /
NK039(ti)024:17: bla na med pa'i dkon mchog rin po che rnam
NK039(ti)024:18: pa gsum la bdag cag lus ngag yid gsum gus
NK039(ti)024:19: pas phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su mchi'o //
NK039(ti)024:20: skyabs gnas dam pa dkon mchog rin po che rnam
NK039(ti)024:21: pa gsum gyi skyabs 'og dam par bdag cag rnams
NK039(ti)024:23: 'dir bla ma yi dam ni gzu dang dpang la mkhas pa /
NK039(ti)024:24: dpa' bo mkha' 'gro ni mthu dang rtsal che ba /
NK039(ti)024:25: ma mgon lcam dral ni bstan pa'i bya ra la mkhas pa /
NK039(ti)024:26: bka' sdod lha srin sde brgyad ni sha khrag la rngam pa /
NK039(ti)024:27: las mkhan dam can rgya mtsho ni gsod gcod kyi las la brtson pa rnams kyang /
NK039(ti)024:28: de ring rdo rje nyi ma'i dus tshod 'dir /
NK039(ti)024:29: sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa bsrung ba dang sdang byed kyi dgra bo gsod pa dang /
NK039(ti)024:30: gnod byed kyi bgegs gdug pa can 'dul ba'i don du /
NK039(ti)024:31: rnal 'byor pa bdag gi dpal dang mgon mdzad pa la ma g.yel bar /
NK039(ti)024:32: snyan gsan cing thugs mkhyen par dgongs su gsol /
NK039(ti)024:35: gzhan yang nyi ma byang shar gyi mtshams /
NK039(ti)024:36: shing yongs 'dus sa brtol gyi rtsa ba /
NK039(ti)024:37: mtsho mu le ting gi nang shed /
NK039(ti)024:38: mthing shun sngon po'i gur khang /
NK039(ti)024:40: me dpung chen po bskal pa 'jigs pa ltar 'bar ba'i dkyil /
NK039(ti)024:41: thod pa rkam rlon rtsigs pa'i sku mkhar /
NK039(ti)024:42: gnam lcags 'ur mo 'bar ba'i gzhal yas khang /
NK039(ti)024:43: mi ro gsar rnying mang po rtsigs pa'i gdan steng na /
NK039(ti)024:44: dus gsum gyis rgyal ba zhi khro ram 'byams kyi
NK039(ti)024:45: lha tshogs spyan sngar rgyal ba'i bstan pa rin po
NK039(ti)024:46: che bsrung bar zhal gyis bzhes pa'i /
NK039(ti)024:47: ma cig dpal ldan lha mo nag mo /
NK039(ti)024:52: chibs su drel rta rkang gsum la bcibs pa /
NK039(ti)024:53: mi ro rta ro khal du 'gel ba /
NK039(ti)024:54: mi khrag rta khrag skom du 'thung ba /
NK039(ti)024:55: mi sha rta sha zas su za ba /
NK039(ti)024:56: mi lpags rta lpags gdan du 'dings ba /
NK039(ti)024:57: nad kyi rkyal pa snga shad la btags pa /
NK039(ti)024:58: tshon gyi gru gu phyi shad la btags pa /
NK039(ti)024:59: phyag g.yas na bdud kyi ral gri phyar ba /
NK039(ti)024:60: dgra bgegs kyi skye rgyud gcod pa /
NK039(ti)024:61: phyag g.yon na b+han+d+ha lcang lo can bsnams pa /
NK039(ti)024:62: dgra bgegs kyi snying khrag zhal du gsol ba /
NK039(ti)024:63: spyi bo'i gtsug na zla bas brgyan pa /
NK039(ti)024:64: ma rig pa'i mun pa gting nas sel ba /
NK039(ti)024:65: lte ba'i dbus nas nyi ma shar bas srid pa'i rgya mtsho gting nas skem par mdzad pa /
NK039(ti)024:66: sku la dur khrod kyi chas brgyad kyi brgyan pa /
NK039(ti)024:67: sku la ye shes kyi me 'bar ba /
NK039(ti)024:68: 'khor bdud mo bye ba 'bum gyis bskor ba /
NK039(ti)024:72: chu srin gyis gdong pa can /
NK039(ti)024:73: chu gri'i gshog pa can bye ba 'bum gyis bskor ba /
NK039(ti)024:74: de rnams kyi mi ro 'khur zhing gnam mtha' bskor ba /
NK039(ti)024:75: mi sha za zhing bswo sgra 'debs pa /
NK039(ti)024:76: mi khrag 'thung zhing ku sgra sgrogs pa /
NK039(ti)024:77: mi lpags gyon zhing sa gzhir rgyug pa /
NK039(ti)024:78: sha zan gyi gsus mo che /
NK039(ti)024:80: rus mchan gyi so rnon ma /
NK039(ti)024:81: nyin gung gi so byed ma /
NK039(ti)024:82: nam gong gi bla len ma /
NK039(ti)024:86: ma bdud 'bum gyis bskor ba rnams kyang bsgrub pa
NK039(ti)024:87: pos ci bcol gyi las bsgrub cing ci bgyid kyi
NK039(ti)024:88: bka' nyan pa / byams shing brtse ba'i ma dang 'dra ba /
NK039(ti)024:89: gdung ba'i tshad ni sring mo dang 'dra ba /
NK039(ti)024:90: da lo yong ba'i bran mo dang 'dra ba /
NK039(ti)024:93: yag pa'i kha 'dzin la dpa' ba /
NK039(ti)024:94: nyes pa'i ngo bzlog la skyen pa /
NK039(ti)024:95: yag nyes kyi gzu dpang la mkhas pa /
NK039(ti)024:96: dam la gnas pa'i mched la gdung ba me bzhin 'bar ba /
NK039(ti)024:104: drag po sgrol ba'i las la mnga' mdzad pa khyed rnams kyang /
NK039(ti)024:105: de ring rdo rje nyi ma'i dus tshod 'dir /
NK039(ti)024:106: do nub nam gyi gung thun 'di la /
NK039(ti)024:107: sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa bsrung ba dang /
NK039(ti)024:108: sdang byed kyi dgra bo gsod pa dang /
NK039(ti)024:109: gnod byed kyi bgegs gdug pa can 'dul ba'i don
NK039(ti)024:110: du rnal 'byor bdag gi dpal dang mgon mdzad pa
NK039(ti)024:111: la ma g.yel bar snyan gsan cing thugs kyi mkhyen
NK039(ti)024:114: dpal ldan lha mo nag mo 'khor dang bcas pa
NK039(ti)024:115: khyed rnams kyi rnal 'byor pa bdag gi dus 'dir
NK039(ti)024:116: bstan pa'i dgra bo sgrol ba'i drag po'i phrin las
NK039(ti)024:117: byed pa 'di la gzu dang dpang mdzod la /
NK039(ti)024:118: dam nyams dgra bo rnams la sngags kyi las mdzod /
NK039(ti)024:120: ces brjod la snyan gsan dbab bo //
NK039(ti)024:122: dpal ldan lha mo nag mo'i srog gi gzer chung gi man ngag la /
NK039(ti)024:124: e khang badz+ra yak+sha khang de yongs su gyur pa
NK039(ti)024:125: las mdun du gshin rje'i btson khang nag po nag
NK039(ti)024:126: la gting zab pa de yi nang du e las
NK039(ti)024:127: gru gsum mthing nag gtings ka che ba /
NK039(ti)024:128: nang na gti mug gi mun pa 'thib pa /
NK039(ti)024:129: phyi na zhe sdang gi me 'bar ba /
NK039(ti)024:130: kha la gsod byed kyi shan pa rgyu ba /
NK039(ti)024:131: zur la bsha' gri mda' mdung 'dril ba /
NK039(ti)024:132: log la phrag dog gi rlung 'tshubs pa /
NK039(ti)024:133: de yi nang du yi ge r+n+rihyongasa su gyur pa las /
NK039(ti)024:134: dgra bgegs gdug pa can de nyid lus rid pa /
NK039(ti)024:135: nyams chung ba mgon skyabs byed pa'i lha thams cad dang bral ba /
NK039(ti)024:136: 'dar phri li li byed pa cig tu gyur /
NK039(ti)024:138: sangs rgyas kyis bden pa dang zhes pas bden stobs rgyas par brjod la /
NK039(ti)024:140: rab bdun nam nyer gcig tu brjod la 'gugs gzhug bya /
NK039(ti)024:142: rang gi thugs ka'i sa bon las 'od zer 'phros pas mdun gyi lha mo la phog pas /
NK039(ti)024:143: lha mos 'khor rnams la gzigs pas /
NK039(ti)024:144: 'khor bdud mo bye ba 'bum rnams nam mkha' gang bar spros /
NK039(ti)024:145: dgra bo'i bla tshe srog gsum gar gnas pa de
NK039(ti)024:146: nyid dper na sha ba khyi'i ded pa bzhin du
NK039(ti)024:147: bkug nas 'ong ba sngar bskyed pa'i gzugs la thim
NK039(ti)024:148: par gyur / lus kyi bya ba lcags kyu'i phyag rgya bya /
NK039(ti)024:150: dzahmh'u bam hoh badz+ra am gu sha dzah yid kyis dmigs pa gsal gdab /
NK039(ti)024:151: ga rang nyid yi dam du gsal ba'i mdun du
NK039(ti)024:152: dpal ldan lha mo zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma spyan
NK039(ti)024:153: gsum ma / mche ba gtsigs pa g.yas ral gri
NK039(ti)024:154: dang g.yon thod khrag thogs pa'i sku mthe bong tsam
NK039(ti)024:156: bsgrub bya'i mchan khung g.yon pa shags kyis bshags nas /
NK039(ti)024:157: tsit+ta gur smug po phub pa lta bu /
NK039(ti)024:158: de yi nang na rnam par shes pa r+n+rihkha dog dkar po shel dwangs pa lta bu de /
NK039(ti)024:159: g.yas kyis ral gri'i rtse mo'i gzer nas /
NK039(ti)024:160: dper na rdo khab len gyis khab blangs pa bzhin
NK039(ti)024:161: du thal gyis phug nas g.yon gyi thod khrag gi
NK039(ti)024:163: bsgrub bya'i snying nang du phar ling ling byed par gyur par bsam /
NK039(ti)024:166: mdun gyi lha mo'i 'khor bdud mo 'bum gtso mo la thim /
NK039(ti)024:167: gtso mo rang la thim pas /
NK039(ti)024:168: rang ngo bo yi dam yin pa la rnam pa
NK039(ti)024:169: dpal ldan lha mo nag mo zhal gcig phyag gnyis
NK039(ti)024:172: ral gri dang thod phrag 'dzin par gyur /
NK039(ti)024:173: mdun du bdud mo 'bum gyi ngo bo lcags kyi spyang mo mgo dgu ma /
NK039(ti)024:174: sku mdog nag mo phyag g.yas pas lcags spyang mgo dgu 'gyed pa /
NK039(ti)024:175: g.yon na zangs kyi 'phar ba lce brgyad pa 'gyed thabs su bsnams pa /
NK039(ti)024:176: sku la lcags kyi tsh+wa tsh+wa 'phro ba /
NK039(ti)024:177: thugs dam bskul ba tsam gyi mdun gyi ma mo
NK039(ti)024:178: dang rang gi sku la lcags spyang dang zangs 'phar
NK039(ti)024:179: / ma bdud dang las mkhan sprul pa dpag tu
NK039(ti)024:180: med pa rnams myur bar song nas dgra bo gson
NK039(ti)024:181: bla gson tshe gar yod pa bkug nas mdun gyi
NK039(ti)024:184: rang thog mar yi dam du gsal bar gzhal yas
NK039(ti)024:185: khang bzhon pa dang bcas bskyed pa'i steng du b+h+yohdama
NK039(ti)024:186: tshig pa bskyed nas ye shes pa spyan drangs nas
NK039(ti)024:191: sngags phreng dang bcas pa bskyed pa ni 'di'i gnad dam ste /
NK039(ti)024:195: gri gug dang be con no //
NK039(ti)024:196: gong du phrin las gzhung bsrong gsungs pa'i gsal byed yig chung 'dir ma bris pa'o //
NK039(ti)024:197: dgra bo lha dang dbye ba'i dmigs pa ni /
NK039(ti)024:198: dgra bo'i rkang pa'i 'og tu yi ge duhnaga po gcig gnas par gyur /
NK039(ti)024:199: de las 'od nag po 'phros pas lus thams cad gang nas /
NK039(ti)024:200: kho dug lnga shin tu rgyas pa'i tshig pa zos
NK039(ti)024:201: nas ma bzod par nyes pa sna tshogs pa du
NK039(ti)024:203: de nas bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro cha sa
NK039(ti)024:204: skyong la zhus 'bul gyi tshul gyis nyes pa bsgrags
NK039(ti)024:205: pas kho'i 'go ba'i lha lnga khros nas gnod pa
NK039(ti)024:206: byed cing / lha tshogs rnams kyis rims kyis sod cig sgrol cig ces lung phog pas /
NK039(ti)024:207: kho'i mgon skyabs byed pa rnams bdud du gyur nas /
NK039(ti)024:208: chos skyong dang shan pa'i tshogs kyis skad cig thal brdul bzhin du brlag par bsam /
NK039(ti)024:209: rgyas pa la spro na srog gzer yig chung du blta'o //
NK039(ti)024:210: ca rlung spros pa'i dmigs pa ni /
NK039(ti)024:211: gzung thag lag nas bzungs la 'bod rbad gsod gsum dril ba'i sngags nyer gcig bzlas /
NK039(ti)024:212: gzung thag kho'i srog rtsa dmar nar gyis drang bar bsams /
NK039(ti)024:213: rang gi sna bug g.yas nas rlung sngo nag gcig
NK039(ti)024:214: phar spros pas kho'i sna bug g.yon du zhugs nas
NK039(ti)024:215: kho'i snying kar mar song ba dang /
NK039(ti)024:216: rlung de nyid lha mo nag mo zhal gcig phyag gnyis spyan gsum pa /
NK039(ti)024:218: phyag g.yas pas gri gug dang /
NK039(ti)024:220: bsgrub bya'i rnam par shes pa mar me 'bar ba ltar dkar da la la byed pa de /
NK039(ti)024:221: g.yon pa'i thod khrag gi nag thul gyis btang bar bsam /
NK039(ti)024:222: g.yas pa'i gri gug gi rtsa a ba d+hu ti'i
NK039(ti)024:223: zhes bya ba'i dngos su sgal tshig gser gyi dang
NK039(ti)024:224: rtse brtsegs pa 'dra ba'i dngos nas /
NK039(ti)024:225: srog rtsa zhes bya ba'i phyi dkar la nang dmar ba /
NK039(ti)024:226: gser gyi rdabs shing brkyang pa 'dra ba'i nang na kun gzhi'i rnam par shes pa zha'o mig can /
NK039(ti)024:227: long ba rkang ba can zhon pa /
NK039(ti)024:228: tshogs drug kun tu rgyug par byed pa gnas pa de rbad kyis bcad par bsam /
NK039(ti)024:229: de ni sems kyi mar me bsad pa dang /
NK039(ti)024:230: srog rtsa dmar po rgal nas gcod pa'i las sbyor yin no //
NK039(ti)024:231: yang rang gi sna bug g.yon pa nas h'uhsngona nag
NK039(ti)024:232: gcig phar 'phros pas kho'i sna bug g.yas su zhugs
NK039(ti)024:233: nas kho'i snying nang du h'uh'oda zer lnga 'phros par
NK039(ti)024:234: bsam / 'od zer de'i kho'i rgyud la yod pa'i bdud rtsi dang /
NK039(ti)024:235: sman dang sngags kyi nus pa dang /
NK039(ti)024:236: bkrag dang gzi dmangs dang srung skyobs thams cad bsdus nas h'u la thim /
NK039(ti)024:237: sngags phar 'phros pas rlung des h'u de bkyag nas /
NK039(ti)024:238: tshangs pa'i bu gar drangs pa /
NK039(ti)024:239: bdag gi sna bug g.yas su zhugs /
NK039(ti)024:240: thugs ka'i h'uhl thim pas bdag bkrag dang gzi mdangs
NK039(ti)024:241: nus mthu dang ldan pas zla ba yar gyi ngos
NK039(ti)024:242: bzhin du gyur / kho lcim lo la ba mo phog pa ltar bsam /
NK039(ti)024:243: rkyal rnying gcus pa ltar nag rnyid rnyid song bar bsam /
NK039(ti)024:245: yig chung gi zhal gdams su blta'o //
NK039(ti)024:246: de ni srung ma 'phrog pa bdud rtsi drang ba'o //
NK039(ti)024:247: cha phur thun gyi dmigs pa ni /
NK039(ti)024:248: swa b+ha stong pa'i ngang las drag po'i phur pa
NK039(ti)024:249: stod dpal ldan lha mo nag mo zhal gcig phyag
NK039(ti)024:250: gnyis ma ral gri dang thod khrag thogs pa smad
NK039(ti)024:251: mgar ba'i sol lam nas bstan pa lta bu me
NK039(ti)024:252: yi tsh+wa tsh+wa 'phro ba zur gsum du 'khor ma
NK039(ti)024:253: mo gsum gnas pa'i rgya mdud gong ma la dkar
NK039(ti)024:255: rgya mdud 'og ma la h'uhnaga po /
NK039(ti)024:256: rtse mor phatahdamara nag gis mtshan pa /
NK039(ti)024:257: rang gis thugs ka'i h'u gis 'od zer gyis rang
NK039(ti)024:258: bzhin gyis gnas nas bskyed pa lta bu'i ye shes
NK039(ti)024:259: pa spyan drangs / dzahmh'u bam ho /
NK039(ti)024:262: dgra bgegs kyi spyi bor btab pa'i drangs pas rang gi spyi bo'i la thim pas /
NK039(ti)024:263: rang bkrag dang gzi mdangs dang ldan par gyur /
NK039(ti)024:264: mgrin par btab pa'i +aahdrangasa pas rang gi mgrin pa'i
NK039(ti)024:265: +aahl thim pas rang nyid nus pa dang ldan par
NK039(ti)024:266: gyur / snying gar btab pa'i h'u n+ri drangs pas rang gi thugs ka'i h'u la thim pas /
NK039(ti)024:267: rang nyid blo gros dang ldan par gyur /
NK039(ti)024:268: khams dang skye mched la btab pa'i bkrag dang gzi
NK039(ti)024:269: mdangs thams cad bsdus nas rang la thim pas rang
NK039(ti)024:270: nyid mthu stobs dang ldan par gyur /
NK039(ti)024:271: kho ni me tog sad kyi khyer ba ltar gyur /
NK039(ti)024:272: lte bar btab pa'i rtsa yi 'khor lo thams cad bcom /
NK039(ti)024:273: mgo bor btab pa'i gzugs phung rdul du brlag /
NK039(ti)024:274: snying kar btab pas rnam par shes pa snying kar
NK039(ti)024:275: nag gi mtshams nas rak+ta bye'u'i klad pa tsam zhig
NK039(ti)024:277: srog rtsar btab pas lus srog rten dang bral /
NK039(ti)024:278: bla gnas su btab pa'i bla gnas kyi rten thams cad bcom par bsam /
NK039(ti)024:279: de la ting 'dzin gsal ba'i ngang nas /
NK039(ti)024:280: ma h+aa ka li re ma ti zhes pas sngags thun mang du brdegs /
NK039(ti)024:281: sngags pa nang 'gras byung na sku gsung thugs kyi sbyor ba bshigs pa'i man ngag go //
NK039(ti)024:282: ja de nas dar ma gsum du bsad pa'i lcags las byas pa'i ral gri'i brten cing /
NK039(ti)024:283: dgra bo'i snying gi nang du ma ma b+h+yo b+h+yo
NK039(ti)024:284: ral gris yu ba la b+h+yos mtshan pa gcig gnas
NK039(ti)024:285: par gyur / ma h+aa ka li re ma ti ces sngags drug cu rtsa gcig brtegs /
NK039(ti)024:286: mtshon thun gyis dmigs gsal ni /
NK039(ti)024:287: sngags bzlas shing bskul pa byas pa tsam gyis /
NK039(ti)024:288: dgra bo'i snying dkar nag gi mtshams su ral gri g.yon du 'khor ba'i shag shag gshegs par bsam /
NK039(ti)024:289: rang lha mor gsal ba'i phyag gis ral gris brdegs pa dang /
NK039(ti)024:290: 'khor gyis lha mo rnams kyi brdegs pas spyi gtsug
NK039(ti)024:291: nas rkang mthil gyis bar du shag shag gshags nas
NK039(ti)024:292: dum bur gtub par bsam la sngags thun brdeg go
NK039(ti)024:293: // nya de nas dug thun sogs thun sna tshogs kyi dmigs pa ni /
NK039(ti)024:294: dgra bo la dug thun sna tshogs brdegs pa'i dug thun gyis dug sna tshogs kyis btab par gyur /
NK039(ti)024:296: pho log glang thabs gag lhog /
NK039(ti)024:300: tsha nad sna tshogs kyis btab par gyur pa'i dgra bo myal myal song bar bsam /
NK039(ti)024:301: rdo thun dang zangs thun dang lcags thun rnams ni
NK039(ti)024:302: ma mo dang bdud mo shan pa'i tshogs su gyur
NK039(ti)024:303: nas gcan gzan gyi god ro bzhin du la las
NK039(ti)024:305: la las rus pa 'chos par bsam /
NK039(ti)024:306: ma h+aa ka li re ma ti zhes sngags drug cu rtsa gcig gis brteg /
NK039(ti)024:307: ta bstabs pa'i dmigs pa ni /
NK039(ti)024:308: dang po byin rlabs pa la /
NK039(ti)024:309: +aahmh'uh b+han+d+ha'i snod yongs shing rgya che ba'i nang du
NK039(ti)024:310: dgra bgegs bsgral ba'i gti mug sha yi ri bo
NK039(ti)024:311: / 'dod chags khrag gi rgya mtsho zhe sdang rus pa'i phung po /
NK039(ti)024:312: 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga dang ldan pa /
NK039(ti)024:313: nam mkha' dang mnyam par gyur /
NK039(ti)024:316: rang gi mdun du rten gtor de nyid dpal ldan
NK039(ti)024:317: lha mo 'khor dang bcas pa rnams rngams pas zhal
NK039(ti)024:318: gdangs shing mche ba gtsigs pa /
NK039(ti)024:319: 'khor drag byed bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang bcas
NK039(ti)024:320: pa rnams kyis dgra bgegs kyi sha khrag rus gsum
NK039(ti)024:321: bstabs pa / 'khor dang bcas pa rnams kyis gcan
NK039(ti)024:322: gzan gyi god ro brtod pa bzhin du sha rnams
NK039(ti)024:324: rus pa rnams 'chos nas til 'bru tsam yang ma lus pa gsol bar bsam /
NK039(ti)024:325: tha de nas rgyun gtor byin rlabs dmigs pa dang bcas pas zhor la gtor ma'i zhal gdams dang /
NK039(ti)024:326: phran tsheg gis zhal gdams 'ga' bris te /
NK039(ti)024:327: brten gtor gyi rgyu ni sha lnga bdud rtsi dang
NK039(ti)024:328: bcas pa nal bu'i sha khrag sogs thod pa'i snod
NK039(ti)024:329: du bshams la / dar nag gi gur phub la
NK039(ti)024:330: dus bzhi'i thun drug tu byin gyis rlabs la las
NK039(ti)024:333: dum bur gtub ste gtor chung dang bcas pa lha mo'i zhal du /
NK039(ti)024:334: de nas lha mo 'khor dang bcas pa la dgra bgegs kyi ru pa bstabs pa ni /
NK039(ti)024:336: ri rab ri yi rtse mo nas //
NK039(ti)024:337: yongs 'dus shing gis rtsa ba nas //
NK039(ti)024:338: mtsho mu le mthing gi nang shed nas //
NK039(ti)024:339: dpal ldan ye shes mgon po dang //
NK039(ti)024:340: dpal ldan lha mo nag mo gnyis //
NK039(ti)024:342: kun kyang dgra bo'i sha dang khrag la dgyes //
NK039(ti)024:343: kun kyang dgra bo'i gsod dang gcod la brtson //
NK039(ti)024:344: za byed gsod byed ma bdun 'khor bcas rnams //
NK039(ti)024:345: gangs ri tsam gyi mche ba gtsigs //
NK039(ti)024:346: gnam sa tsam gyi zhal gdangs la //
NK039(ti)024:347: glog dmar tsam gyi ljags brkyong la //
NK039(ti)024:348: nyi zla tsam gyi spyan bgrod la //
NK039(ti)024:349: stong gsum tsam gyi myid pa ru //
NK039(ti)024:350: gnod byed byad ma dgra bgegs zhal du bstabs //
NK039(ti)024:351: bag chags kun sbyangs 'khor ba'i lam bkag phyir //
NK039(ti)024:352: za byed mi 'gyur chos nyid klong du rol //
NK039(ti)024:353: badz+ra yak+sha kha kha kh+aa hi kh+aa hi /
NK039(ti)024:355: dgra bgegs gzugs kyi phung po dang //
NK039(ti)024:356: tshogs kyi zhal zas gtor ma 'di //
NK039(ti)024:357: dpal ldan lha mo nag mo yis //
NK039(ti)024:358: zhal du bstabs so kha ram kha hi //
NK039(ti)024:359: bdud mo ba lam dre'u sna ma //
NK039(ti)024:360: sring gcig khri sman sa le ma //
NK039(ti)024:361: khol mo chu srin gdong pa can //
NK039(ti)024:362: bstan pa'i gtso mo skyid 'thing ma //
NK039(ti)024:363: dus bzhi'i rgyal mo chen mo bzhi //
NK039(ti)024:364: nang gi blon mo 'khor bcas kyi //
NK039(ti)024:365: zhal du bstabs so kh+aa ram kh+aa hi /
NK039(ti)024:366: gzhan yang bdud mo bye ba 'bum //
NK039(ti)024:367: sha dang khrag la rngam pa yis //
NK039(ti)024:368: ma mo'i tshogs kyis zhal du bstob //
NK039(ti)024:369: khug chos dbyar mo la sogs pa'i //
NK039(ti)024:370: brtan ma bcu gnyis 'khor bcas kyis //
NK039(ti)024:371: zhal du bstabs so kh+aa ram kh+aa hi //
NK039(ti)024:372: gzhan yang las la skyes pa yis //
NK039(ti)024:373: gnod sbyin mo dang sha za mo //
NK039(ti)024:374: sha khrag zas su za ba yis //
NK039(ti)024:375: pho nya ma mo'i tshogs rnams kyis //
NK039(ti)024:376: zhal du bstabs so kh+aa ram kh+aa hi //
NK039(ti)024:377: mgul du sbring ngo a ra li //
NK039(ti)024:378: dbyings su bstim mo sa ma ya //
NK039(ti)024:379: thog thog ljib ljib hub kyis thob //
NK039(ti)024:380: bstabs pa bdag gi mi nor la //
NK039(ti)024:381: bzhes pa khyod kyi ma nor cig /
NK039(ti)024:382: gsol lo rol cig kha ram kh+aa hi //
NK039(ti)024:383: ma h+aa mam sa la kh+aa hi //
NK039(ti)024:384: ma h+aa rak+ta la kh+aa hi //
NK039(ti)024:385: ma h+aa tsit+ta la kh+aa hi //
NK039(ti)024:386: ma h+aa ba su ta la kh+aa hi //
NK039(ti)024:387: ma h+aa ko ro tsa na la kh+aa hi //
NK039(ti)024:388: ma h+aa king ni ri ti la kh+aa hi /
NK039(ti)024:390: dpal ldan lha mo 'khor bcas kyi sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa bsrungs shig /
NK039(ti)024:391: dkon mchog gi dbu 'phang bstod cig /
NK039(ti)024:392: sdang byed kyi dgra sod cig /
NK039(ti)024:393: gnod byed kyi bgegs thul cig /
NK039(ti)024:394: bar chad kyi rkyen bzlog cig /
NK039(ti)024:395: ces brjod la gzugs cha gnyis su bya ba'i cha gcig ling chung bcas pa rten gtor du bstabs /
NK039(ti)024:396: gcig rgyun gtor du bsnan la bzhag /
NK039(ti)024:397: de nas rgyun gtor dgra phyogs su 'phangs la bskul ba bya ba ni /
NK039(ti)024:399: snang srid ma mo rab mdar logs //
NK039(ti)024:400: lha srid sde brgyad rab mdar logs //
NK039(ti)024:401: bdud mo 'khor tshogs rab mdar logs //
NK039(ti)024:402: bdag gis ma lan ma nyes so //
NK039(ti)024:404: snang srid ma mo dam la 'dus //
NK039(ti)024:405: lha srin sde brgyad dam la 'dus //
NK039(ti)024:407: bdag gis ma lan ma nyes so //
NK039(ti)024:409: snang srid ma mo dgra la cha re ran //
NK039(ti)024:410: lha srin sde brgyad dgra la cha re ran //
NK039(ti)024:411: bdud mo 'khor tshogs dgra la cha re ran //
NK039(ti)024:412: bdag gis ma lan ma nyes so //
NK039(ti)024:413: bstan pa bshigs pa'i dgra bo la //
NK039(ti)024:414: nad kyi bdag mos nad sna drongs //
NK039(ti)024:415: yams kyi bdag mos nad sna drongs //
NK039(ti)024:416: rims kyi bdag mos nad sna drongs //
NK039(ti)024:417: khrag gis bdag mos nad sna drongs //
NK039(ti)024:418: nad kyi rkyal pa dgra la phye //
NK039(ti)024:419: tshon gyi gru gu dgra la rkyong //
NK039(ti)024:420: thog dang zor gyi sna drongs la //
NK039(ti)024:421: dgra bo'i yul du dmag la chos //
NK039(ti)024:422: dgra bo'i mi mkhar dmar po rtse nas shig /
NK039(ti)024:423: sa mkhar skya bo rming nas shig /
NK039(ti)024:424: ma la las bcol mthu ma chung //
NK039(ti)024:425: bcol pa'i phrin las 'grub par mdzod //
NK039(ti)024:426: ma h+aa ka li re ma ti dgra la thun b+h+yo b+h+yo /
NK039(ti)024:427: dpal ldan lha mo'i drag po las thun gyi cho ga rdzogs so //
NK039(ti)024:428: sangs rgyas bstan pa bsrung ba'i mtshon char shog /
NK039(ti)024:429: bstan pa'i rgyal mtshan rab tu brtan gyur cig /
NK039(ti)024:430: bzlog sngags byed na b+h+yo rnams kyi sham du bzlog go zhes pa gdabs la bzlog /
NK039(ti)024:431: dpal ldan lha mo'i srog gi gzer chung gi rgyud nas btus pa'o //
NK039(ti)024:432: las rim thun gyis zhal gdams rgyud las byung ba /
NK039(ti)024:433: slob dpon pad+ma 'byung gnas kyi mdzad pa'o //
NK039(ti)024:434: gzhan la bshad na mkha' 'gro'i chad pa 'byung ba'i shin tu dam pas gsang bar bya'o //
